original: ho: sa dgyes shing mnyes par byas //
analyzed: ho: sa dgyes shing mnyes par byas //

original: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i nyi zla'i bar gyi yi ge'i phreng ba gnyis po la dmigs la sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i nyi zla'i bar gyi yi ge'i phreng ba gnyis po la dmigs la sngags bzlas so //
translated: Focus on the two garlands of syllables between the sun and moon in the heart of the gnosis being and recite the mantra.

original: de nas bum pa 'od kyis mer gsal ba @64b la blo gzhag pas sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan /
analyzed: de nas bum pa 'od kyis mer gsal ba @64b la blo gzhag pas sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan /

original: de nas dmigs pa gsum rang dag pa ni dgra mtha' dag gi bsam gtan /
analyzed: de nas dmigs pa gsum rang dag pa ni dgra mtha' dag gi bsam gtan /

original: de ltar rdzogs pa la dmigs nas sngags rdzogs pa'i tshe bud med bu 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar rdzogs pa la dmigs nas sngags rdzogs pa'i tshe bud med bu 'dod pa ste /

original: zhag gcig gam zhag gsum smrang bar gnas par byas la /
analyzed: zhag gcig gam zhag gsum smrang bar gnas par byas la /

original: gos gsar pa byin la khrus nas bton la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: gos gsar pa byin la khrus nas bton la sems bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la /
translated: Give new clothes, and having bathed, bring out (the child). Having generated the thought of awakening, and so forth,

original: dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur la de'i rjes la rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la srung skud gdags so //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du bcug la dbang bskur la de'i rjes la rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la srung skud gdags so //
translated: admit (the child) into the mandala, confer initiation, and after that perform an extensive burnt offering of one hundred and eight (oblations). Tie on a protection cord.

original: de ltar byas na dpal nges par bskyed do //
analyzed: de ltar byas na dpal nges par bskyed do //
translated: If one does it in that way, one will certainly generate glory.

original: dpal skyed pa bkra shis skyed pa /
analyzed: dpal skyed pa bkra shis skyed pa /
